data.fullContent: Online retail giant Bobuck Industries has agreed to buy Farm Fresh Foods for $11.5 billion in cash, an announcement that shocked the grocery store industry and could have huge ramifications for the future of food retailing in the U.S. The all-cash deal represents a 31 percent premium over Farm Fresh's closing share price last Thursday. Bobuck is trying to reshape the food retailing industry like it already has with electronics, fashion, sporting goods, and other sectors. Analysts commented that consumers are more likely to buy online than ever before, and younger people in particular are becoming less and less interested in driving to brick-and-mortar stores. According to analyst Brenda Park, Bobuck could eventually use its expertise in data and analytics to transform how food is grown, distributed, and transported.

q1.translation: 在线零售巨头Bobuck Industries同意以115亿美元现金收购Farm Fresh Foods，这一消息震惊了食品杂货行业，并可能对美国食品零售业的未来产生巨大影响。全现金交易比Farm Fresh上周四的收盘价高出31%。
q1.front: Online retail giant Bobuck Industries has agreed to buy Farm Fresh Foods for $11.5 billion in cash, an announcement that shocked the grocery store industry and could have huge ramifications for the future of food retailing in the U.S. The all-cash deal represents a 31 percent premium over Farm Fresh's closing share price last Thursday.
q1.content: Online retail giant Bobuck Industries has ____ to buy Farm Fresh Foods ____ $11.5 billion in cash, an announcement that shocked the grocery store industry and could have huge ramifications for the future of food retailing in the U.S. The all-cash deal represents a 31 ____ premium over Farm Fresh's closing share price last Thursday.

q2.translation: 在线零售巨头Bobuck Industries同意以115亿美元现金收购Farm Fresh Foods，这一消息震惊了食品杂货行业，并可能对美国食品零售业的未来产生巨大影响。全现金交易比Farm Fresh上周四的收盘价高出31%。Bobuck正试图重塑食品零售业，就像它已经在电子、时尚、体育用品和其他行业一样。分析人士评论说，消费者比以往任何时候都更有可能在网上购物，尤其是年轻人越来越不喜欢开车去实体店。分析师布伦达·帕克(Brenda Park)表示，Bobuck最终可以利用其在数据和分析方面的专长，改变食品的种植、配送和运输方式。
q2.front: Online retail giant Bobuck Industries has agreed to buy Farm Fresh Foods for $11.5 billion in cash, an announcement that shocked the grocery store industry and could have huge ramifications for the future of food retailing in the U.S. The all-cash deal represents a 31 percent premium over Farm Fresh's closing share price last Thursday.
q2.middle: Bobuck is trying to reshape the food retailing industry like it already has with electronics, fashion, sporting goods, and other sectors.
q2.ending: Analysts commented that consumers are more likely to buy online than ever before, and younger people in particular are becoming less and less interested in driving to brick-and-mortar stores. According to analyst Brenda Park, Bobuck could eventually use its expertise in data and analytics to transform how food is grown, distributed, and transported.

options.sentence: Bobuck is trying to reshape the food retailing industry like it already has with electronics, fashion, sporting goods, and other sectors.
Farm Fresh has said that their purchase of Bobuck will help them advance into a new marketplace.
In order to celebrate Farm Fresh's latest expansion, they will be offering free delivery on orders of $25 or more.
Bobuck also said the movie rental service will be available for use without a membership, but that order processing will be limited to select products.

options.sentence: Farm Fresh has started offering an online grocery shopping service to a small number of customers.
Bobuck is expected to open two more brick-and-mortar stores as part of the deal with Farm Fresh Foods.
Bobuck will purchase Farm Fresh Foods in an attempt to reshape the food retailing industry.
Bobuck has long offered free two-day shipping on all electronics and sporting goods orders.
